subject: Re: A Holiday picture of my "Ghost Stuff"
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Bill,

The PC thing to say is.. "I like them all just the same, and use them 
equally".  Now none of them will get to jealous over another.
Actually the one I have spent the most time with is the Micro Box, 
since I keep adding more things to it.
I do fancy the RSH 12-470 though... it's my favorite... but please 
don't tell the others.
It's easy to carry around, has a built in speaker, and does not have 
that clicking when sweeping.
Although I have not had the opportunity to use any of them as much as 
I'd like, but maybe in the coming year I will have more chances to 
dabble.
Plus.. I'm sure I'll be adding more things to the Micro Box, as long 
as there is still room to stuff components and wires.

Happy Holidays!
- Mike


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> What a nice assortment of gear. Although we shouldn't pick favorite 
> babies, care to name if any of these are your most often used and 
> why? Thanks and Happy Holidays Mike. -Bill
>
